caption: Relating to certificates of number and certificates of title issued by and records kept by the Parks and Wildlife Department; creating a criminal offense.
summary: This bill amends Parks and Wildlife Code regarding vessel and outboard motor titles, certificates, and ownership records. It updates definitions, procedures for title transfers, security interests, and electronic records. No specific impacts on Chinese immigrants or individuals are mentioned, as the bill focuses on vessel/watercraft registration and titling procedures that apply equally to all vessel owners regardless of nationality.
translation: 该法案修订了公园和野生动物法典中关于船只和舷外发动机的所有权证书、证明和所有权记录的规定。它更新了定义、所有权转让程序、担保权益和电子记录等内容。该法案没有特别提到对中国移民或个人的影响，因为法案主要关注船只/水上交通工具登记和所有权证书程序，这些程序平等适用于所有船只所有者，不分国籍。
committees:
1. Natural Resources Committee
2. Transportation Committee
3. State Affairs Committee
